alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 10 at 8:56AM EST until December 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 719 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA CALHOUN GULF JACKSON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA COLQUITT THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLAKELY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROWNTOWN, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHULA, CLARKS MILL, CLARKSVILLE, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTON, CUBA, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DAWSON, DAWSON MUNICIPAL A/P, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DILLON, DILLS, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOUGLASVILLE, DOVEREL, DRIFTON, DURHAM, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FORRESTER, FORT GADSDEN, FRINK, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GRAVES, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HEROD, HILLIARDVILLE, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MORGAN, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NEWTON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, PALMYRA, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PORT ST. JOE, PRETORIA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SMITHVILLE, SNEADS, SOPCHOPPY, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SWEETWATER, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TILTON, TURNER CITY, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WALKER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, WHITE CITY, WILLIAMSBURG, WORTH, AND YEOMANS.
